numlitem.para: With center tank fueled, fuel quantity remaining in main wing tanks is adequate to reach a suitable airport if remaining center tank pump fails at any time,
Center tank and auxiliary tank (if installed) fuel included as part of Zero Fuel Weight, and
Center tank quantity indication is operative.

note.para: Stabilizer and Auxiliary tanks are not installed on UPS aircraft.
The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

On the ground prior to engine start the >FUEL OVD CTR L (or R) EICAS advisory message may be displayed if the CWT contains more than 17,000 lbs of fuel. After engine start and prior to cruise the EICAS advisory may be displayed if CWT contains more than 6000 lbs and at cruise the message may be displayed of the CWT contains more than 4000 lbs.

numlitem.para: Related CWT Override/Jettison Pump Switch must remain selected OFF.
For takeoff, ensure the Override/Jettison Pumps are selected OFF until cruise.

note.para: With both pumps OFF, the fuel management system will automatically operate as if CWT is empty.

numlitem.para: CWT fuel included as part of ZFW may be used en route provided one CWT Override/Jettison is operative. To use CWT fuel en route select the operative Override/Jettison Pump ON and accomplish AOM Non-Normal Checklist FUEL PRESS CTR for a single CWT pump inoperative.
Wing tank fuel must be adequate to reach a suitable airport if the remaining center tank pump fails.
Center tank fuel must be included as part of the Zero Fuel Weight but is considered usable en route.

note.para: Make a manual calculation of the ZFW to assure "if" fuel becomes trapped (second pump fails) the aircraft has adequate fuel to make it to destination and/or not land over maximum landing weight. A second weight and balance is not required.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to fuel jettison module in the cockpit: "L (or R) CWT OVRD/JETT PUMP INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deactivate the inoperative fuel pump(s) by opening and collaring the appropriate circuit breaker(s):

numlitem.para: Center Left override/jettison pump: P414 panel, FUEL OVRD/JTSN PUMP CTR LEFT.
Center Right override/jettison pump: P415 panel, FUEL OVRD/JTSN PUMP CTR RIGHT.
